thread.section_title: Embassy Suites by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport (SFO) - Waterfront - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Burlingame, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great family friendly stay.
thread.title_full: Great family friendly stay. - Review of Embassy Suites by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport (SFO) - Waterfront, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: David Y
title: Great family friendly stay.
text: Always a fun stay that caters to adult and kid needs. Love the "happy hour" and breakfast. Kids love the pool! I only wish the pool had more seating for adults. The two room suite is a plus as well as kids and adults can separate after a long day.
